description:

  • Business podcast 'Breaking Biz' with over 10,000 subscribers


This course is designed to simplify the best practices of Content Marketing so you can understand how to reach and engage your audience and rank as high as possible in search engines such as Google and Bing.

Master the art of Content Marketing using proven, simple and effective techniques.

  • Discover the basics of professional content
  • Learn the one simple trick to effective content marketing
  • Hear about the man who saved his business by blogging
  • Understand different formats of content and which ones work best online

Knowing how to use content marketing best practices is an essential element of today's online marketing requirements.

In the course you will learn about the man who used blogging to save his company from the recession in America. You'll hear from one of London's content marketing experts on what the future of online content is and how great content marketing made him so loyal to the social media company, Buffer.

From understanding the basics, through to learning simple content marketing techniques, you will leave this course ready to engage people online and send your website up the Google rankings.

I designed this course to offer you an easy to follow, comprehensive guide to Content Marketing. Content marketing is a topic that can be made complicated very quickly. This is why I have prepared slide presentations with a running commentary, so you can enjoy the visuals and explanations that go with them.

Throughout the course, there are talking head videos so I can check in and remind you of the key takeaway points from the lectures.

I hope you enjoy learning the content marketing basics, and I look forward to connecting with students who have any requirements or questions.
